artifacts.stakeholder_engagement_matrix: Product services stakeholder analysis completed with 8 key stakeholders identified

artifacts.problem_statement: Product delivery and service enablement challenges identified with focus on launch speed, user adoption, and operational support

artifacts.scope_matrix: Product services scope boundaries defined with clear IN/OUT scope, assumptions and constraints

artifacts.as_is_documentation: Senior Level strategic analysis completed with comprehensive system architecture assessment, performance gap analysis, technical debt evaluation, and strategic recommendations

problem_statement.focus: Product launch delays, service delivery challenges, integration bottlenecks

scope_definition.key_constraints: 6-month timeline, existing tech stack, business hours support

as_is_analysis.performance_gaps: Creation 2-5 days vs target hours (85-90% improvement needed), approval 1-2 weeks vs target 1-2 days (70-85% improvement needed)

strategic_assessment.system_fragmentation: 4+ different survey creation methods across organization
strategic_assessment.technical_debt: Legacy dependencies, limited API maturity, scattered database schemas
strategic_assessment.compliance_risks: Audit trail deficiency, data security gaps, inconsistent regulatory handling

project_context.requirement: BRQ202 - Survey Management Application providing admin FE environment for business users/owners with survey template creation, management, versioning, and role-based access
project_context.domain_focus: Product Services aspects including product lifecycle support, service delivery, system integrations, and operational procedures
